name: Daisy (HappySunset)
description:
Install instructions

Basic operation:

wasd - move

space- jump and double jump

known bug:

1. If you eat daisy, daisy can give you buff and debuff for a while. However, player can't remove debuff because of webgl's transition. As so far,  the best strategy to pass levels  is not eating any daisy.

2. Can't show the ending in the level4's final transport circle.
